TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWrappedMember

Docs.summary: Defines methods for accessing the object that a member is defined on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on. This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetWrappedObject() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a class, returns the object that a member is defined on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each wrapped object contains the information for one member (field, property, or method), together with a copy of the instantiated object that the member is defined on. This enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.
